name: Create Tree Structure
precondition: User has logged into the Wiki system and has creation permissions

steps.expectedResult: The input box for creating a tree structure appears
The input box displays the name entered by the user
The tree structure is successfully created and displayed in the list

description: Test whether the user can successfully create a new tree structure

name: Edit Tree Structure
precondition: The tree structure already exists, the user has logged into the Wiki system, and has editing permissions

steps.step: Select the structure to edit from the tree structure list
steps.expectedResult: The selected tree structure is highlighted
Enters edit mode, displaying the current information of the tree structure
The input box displays the user's modified content
Modification successful, the tree structure is updated, and the new name is displayed in the list

description: Test whether the user can successfully edit an existing tree structure
reviewRemark: Insufficient accuracy and correctness of the test steps, unable to execute and verify accurately

name: Post Comment
precondition: User has logged into the Wiki system and has commenting permissions

steps.expectedResult: Document content loads successfully

steps.step: Enter comment content in the comment area
steps.expectedResult: The comment input box displays the user's entered content
The comment is successfully posted and displayed below the document content

description: Test whether the user can successfully post a comment on a document page

name: Delete Tree Structure
precondition: The tree structure exists, the user has logged into the Wiki system, and has deletion permissions

steps.step: Select the structure to delete from the tree structure list
steps.expectedResult: The selected tree structure is highlighted
A confirmation dialog appears asking for confirmation to delete
The tree structure is successfully deleted and no longer appears in the list

description: Test whether the user can successfully delete an existing tree structure

name: View Page Version History
precondition: There are multiple versions of the page

steps.expectedResult: The system displays a list of all versions of the page

steps.step: User selects a version to view
steps.expectedResult: The system shows the detailed content of the selected version

description: Test whether the user can view the page version history

name: Restore to Old Version
precondition: The user has selected an old version in the version history

steps.step: User clicks the 'Restore this Version' button
steps.expectedResult: The system pops up a confirmation dialog
The system restores the page to the selected old version, and the user receives a notification of successful restoration

description: Test whether the user can successfully restore the page to a previous version

name: Set Watermark Transparency
precondition: The user is logged in and has entered the watermark settings page

steps.step: User selects the watermark transparency adjustment slider
steps.expectedResult: The slider can slide normally
The watermark transparency is updated to 50%
The system saves the watermark transparency settings, and the user receives a notification of successful saving

description: Test whether the user can successfully set the transparency of the watermark

name: Download Page Version
precondition: The user is viewing the version history of the page

steps.step: User clicks the 'Download' button next to a version
steps.expectedResult: The system prompts the user to save the file

description: Test whether the user can download a specific page version

name: Verify user has space management permissions
precondition: User is logged in and has space management permissions

steps.expectedResult: Successfully loads the space management page
New space created successfully, the page indicates creation success
Successfully saves permission settings, the page indicates save success
Space deleted successfully, the page indicates deletion success

description: This test case is used to verify that a user can successfully create, edit, and delete spaces when they have space management permissions.

name: Verify user does not have space management permissions
precondition: User is logged in and does not have space management permissions

steps.expectedResult: Displays a message indicating no permission to access

steps.step: Attempt to create a new space
steps.expectedResult: Informs the user they do not have permission to create a space

description: This test case is used to verify that when a user does not have space management permissions, the system should correctly prompt for lack of access.
reviewRemark: Inconsistency or conflicts with logical relationships between other test cases

name: Verify administrator can view comments
precondition: Administrator is logged in

steps.expectedResult: Successfully loads the comment list

description: This test case is used to verify whether the administrator can successfully view all comments.

name: Verify normal user cannot view comments
precondition: Normal user is logged in

steps.expectedResult: Displays a message indicating no permission to access comments

description: This test case is used to verify that a normal user cannot view comments and receives an appropriate message.

name: Verify user can reset password
precondition: User is logged in and requests a password reset

steps.expectedResult: Successfully loads the password reset form
Displays a confirmation message that the reset email has been sent

description: This test case is to ensure that users can successfully request a password reset and receive confirmation.

name: Verify that the administrator can edit comments
precondition: The administrator is logged in and the comment exists

steps.step: Select a comment and click edit
steps.expectedResult: Enter the editing page

steps.step: Modify the comment content and save
steps.expectedResult: Comment modified successfully, page prompts save successful

description: This test case is used to verify whether the administrator can successfully edit comments

name: Verify that the administrator can reply to comments
precondition: The administrator is logged in and the comment exists

steps.step: Select a comment and click reply
steps.expectedResult: Enter the reply page

steps.step: Enter the reply content and submit
steps.expectedResult: Reply successful, page shows the new reply

description: This test case is used to verify whether the administrator can successfully reply to comments

name: Allow users to customize style functional test case
precondition: The user is logged into the Wiki system and has editing permissions

steps.expectedResult: User settings interface loads successfully
Custom style setting area displayed
Style preview updates, showing new style effects
System prompts that the style was saved successfully

steps.step: Refresh the page to verify style application
steps.expectedResult: Page style matches custom settings

description: This test case is used to verify the complete process of customizing styles for users in the Wiki system

name: Verify user permissions for editing comments
precondition: User is logged in and has permissions

steps.expectedResult: User successfully enters the edit mode

steps.step: Make changes to the comment and save
steps.expectedResult: Comment saved successfully

description: This test case is used to ensure that the user has the right permissions to edit comments

name: User Click Article Link Test
precondition: User is logged in and on the Wiki homepage

steps.step: User selects an article on the homepage and clicks the article title
steps.expectedResult: The page successfully redirects to the detailed content of the selected article

steps.step: User views the title and content of the selected article
steps.expectedResult: The title and content of the article are displayed accurately

description: Verify that the user can successfully navigate to the article page and view the content after clicking the article link

name: User Edit Article Test
precondition: User has editing permissions and has opened the article to edit

steps.step: User enters new content in the editing box
steps.expectedResult: The editing box correctly displays the new input content
The system prompts that the content has been successfully saved and returns to the article page
The article page displays the updated content

description: Verify the user's ability to edit and successfully save an article in the Wiki system
reviewRemark: The boundary definitions of the test case are not clear enough

name: User Share Article Function Test
precondition: User has accessed and opened the article to share

steps.expectedResult: A share options menu pops up

steps.step: User selects a specific social media platform to share
steps.expectedResult: A share link is generated and the user is prompted that it has been successfully copied

steps.step: User pastes and sends the share content on social media
steps.expectedResult: Successfully publishes the share content on social media, and the link is valid

description: Verify the user's ability to share an article in the Wiki system via social media platforms.

name: User Search Article Test
precondition: User is on the homepage and has access to the search bar.

steps.step: User types a keyword into the search bar and hits enter
steps.expectedResult: The system displays a list of articles related to the keyword

steps.step: User selects one of the articles from the search results
steps.expectedResult: The page redirects to the selected article with relevant content displayed

description: Verify that the user can search for articles using keywords and view the relevant content.
